description: Contents: Middle commentary on Aristotle's De anima (ff. 2r-40r). Paraphrase on Aristotle's De Coelo et Mundo (ff. 41r-60r). Paraphrase on Aristotle's De Generatione et Corruptione (ff. 61r-69r). Paraphrase on Aristotle's De Sensu et Sensibili (ff. 70r-87v). Paraphrase on Aristotle's Meteorologica (ff. 93r-119r). All translated by Mosheh Ibn Tibon.
title: Collection of Averroës' philosophical writings
author: Averroës
